newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: GOLF-IRISH OPEN FIRST ROUND SCORES.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-IRISH OPEN FIRST ROUND SCORES.

text.p: Leading scores after the first round of the Irish Open golf tournament on Thursday (British unless stated):
68 David Gilford, Colin Montgomerie, Robert Allenby (Australia), Rodger Davis (Australia)
69 Nick Faldo, Roger Chapman, Constantino Rocca (Italy), Miguel Angel Jimenez (Spain), Kalle Vainola (Finland)
70 Phillip Price, Gary Evans, Robert Lee, Wayne Westner (South Africa), Peter Baker, Eamonn Darcy (Ireland), Alberto Binaghi (Italy), Rolf Muntz (Netherlands)

71 Daren Lee, Daniel Chopra (Sweden), Eoghan O'Connell (Ireland), John Mellor, Massimo Florioli (Italy), Derrick Cooper, David Carter, Padraig Harrington (Ireland), Sam Torrance, Ian Woosnam, Anders Forsbrand (Sweden) Max Anglert (Sweden), Mark Roe, David Howell, Mathias Gronberg (Sweden), Andrew Sherborne, Klas Eriksson (Sweden)

72 David Tapping, Darren Cole (Australia), Paul McGinlay (Ireland), Ronan Rafferty, Paul Lawrie, Van Phillips, Scott Henderson, Jose Coceres (Argentina), Richard Green (Australia), Darren Clarke, Eduardo Romero (Argentina), Michael Jonzon (Sweden), Peter Hedblom (Sweden), Jim Payne, Gary Clark, Katsuyoshi Tomori (Japan), Niclas Fasth (Sweden), Diego Borrego (Spain), Jonathon Lomas, Francis Howley (Ireland)
